SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Socialped] ( [Socialped_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [Socialped_Titolo] varchar(200) NULL , [Socialchannels_Ky] int NULL , [Socialped_DataInizio] smalldatetime NULL , [Socialped_DataFine] smalldatetime NULL , [Socialped_Url] varchar(MAX) NULL , [Socialped_UserInsert] int NULL , [Socialped_UserUpdate] int NULL , [Socialped_UserDelete] int NULL , [Socialped_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [Socialped_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [Socialped_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Socialped] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_Socialped PRIMARY KEY ([Socialped_Ky])
